website_summaries.verdict: While it's a reasonable option if you like the daybed design, others on our list offer similar or better workmanship at lower price points.
pros: Handy bottom drawer w/ample storage space
Easy to put together with the included tools
cons: Some owners express concerns about the durability of particle board components

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically wanted the daybed style toddler bed and I found this one, the perfect one, here on Amazon. I was hesitant to purchase though because the reviews were so mixed, with many stating that the bed was damaged or missing pieces. I took a leap of faith and ordered it anyway because the price was unbeatable and I REALLY wanted this bed....and I’m glad I did. We received a well packaged product in pristine condition with all of the necessary pieces included. It took my husband about 2 hours put it together by himself and the outcome was perfect! Such a beautiful little bed, perfect for my little princess!!
customer_reviews.author: KDudley

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated !
customer_reviews.text: Very frustrated with this product right now. Took it out of box to put it together (with our very excited toddler watching) only to realize I’m missing parts.. I call DOM customer service and I’m told they will email me a form that I have to fill out and send back and they’ll review it and see if they can send me the part... then I get NO timeframe on how long this might take bc it depends on “if they can help me”. So I boxed it all back up (with a crying toddler) and put it away until I can figure out what’s going on because it’s gonna cost way too much to send it back
customer_reviews.author: ALICIA

customer_reviews.title: Looks used!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this bed because I was planning to convert my daughter’s room into a big girl room for her second birthday. I had been watching this item for a while, but it was sold out when I initially decided to buy it. It eventually came back in stock, so I ordered it, and it arrived about a week before her birthday. We waited until the night before to open the box. However, we didn’t even get to put the bed together because most of the pieces had noticeable dents and dings. I believe this was a returned item that got repackaged.
customer_reviews.author: Savontb82Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to order this product twice and both products came in damaged and also came with inconsistent color pieces. (Photos attached) I ordered the white bed and the under the bed drawer came in a lavender shade. I had to return the product twice. You may have better luck with a different color other than white. However, based on my experience, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to construct
customer_reviews.text: The bed is easy to put together I did it with my 5 yearold. The instructions are easy to follow. The end result is a very adorable bed it seems pretty sturdy. I gave 4 stars because I specifically got this bed (paid more for it) because of the drawer. The drawer is still a good size however it doesnt have the same width as the bed itself. Also one of the end rails came scratched up, part of it looks like it's been painted over so it happened at the factory. All in all good bed I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: Such a great and cute bed for the money. Took about a solid hour to assemble with the help of my husband. Nice color. Study and durable. My 23 month son loves to "jump rabbit" on it. I've caught my 11 year old sitting on the bed to my dismay thinking she would break it but nope still standing. Love the extra storage below. My son loves that he's no longer trapped in a crib. He can get in and out and he pleases!!
customer_reviews.author: COCO W

customer_reviews.title: Shoty craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: Received this product and it has been beat up. The box was a mess and the bed had dings all over it. I originally thought ot was done during shipping but all the dings were stained over matching the bed, so had to be done during the manufacturing process. Had i not needed it due to emergency i would have returned it. It will also take two people to assemble. Would not purchasr this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stenberg

customer_reviews.title: and the bed is sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed for our almost 3 year old because we have a new baby on the way. The bed did come with some minor scratches, I'm guessing from shipping and packaging but this is not a big deal to me. My son loves this bed and has slept well in it. The color was true to pictures, and matches the crib we have. Assembly took about an hour for my husband, and the bed is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for money.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely think this is the best value for the money. My daughter started sleeping in it at 12 months which may of been a little early. The bar isn’t all that long so she struggled with not rolling out of bed. Luckily it sets super close to the floor so no damaged done. I Definitely only recommend it for 18months and up. Don’t have high expectations for the compartment underneath. It’s very basic and will only store very light things. Honestly I don’t even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shine

customer_reviews.title: Okay bed but don’t expect great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very cute bed works nice in the aspect of transition however I had gotten two of them because the first one had a lot of scratch marks on it and seemed to already partially used and painted over. The bed was completely assembled and the drawer ended up having broken pieces unable to put it together I had to order a replacement that the bed itself the condition really wasn’t much better with scratches and the hardware to assemble didn’t completely fit it left pieces not equal and to short but we ended it up making it to work between having two bed sets. It works for the most part but don’t expect perfect condition bed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hagmaier

customer_reviews.title: It could be packaged better. This will just be used a couple years ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not yet put together but opened the box..a couple pieces damaged in shipping but luckily won't show much. It could be packaged better. This will just be used a couple years as a transition bed, the quality is mediocre but I'm satisfied based on the price point & the length of time we will need it.
customer_reviews.author: Country Gal

customer_reviews.title: Middle support bar came broken.
customer_reviews.text: Giving 3 stars. Bed looks great, easy instructions. Taking 2 stars off because while assembling the bed the middle supply board is messed up. The bolt hole was crooked and the bolt wouldn't go in and there's a crack at the drill hole. Makes me feel it's not as sturdy. Bed lookes good and everything else went together pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my granddaughter for her visits and she loves it! How can you go wrong with that! I like it as well, it is very sturdy ..love the style and color of it. You definitely need to pay attention to the instructions (which my son didn't initially do). It did have a ding in it but it wasn't to bad and I know it occurred during shipment because the box was a little damaged..it was very well packaged and I don't think theres much more packaging they could have put in it to prevent that from happening. I can't really blame the company for that.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler bed for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed. It is very pretty when set up and my son had a great time helping us put it together. He is short for a 2-year old and I wanted a bed that is close to the ground. He LOVES being in his big boy bed as you can see from the second pic.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Instructions have several mistakes
customer_reviews.text: Good bedframe, but the directions have mistakes that could cause some issues if you've never put anything together before. My daughter loves her new bed and is low enough to floor, she can easily climb in and out of bed herself.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the espresso bed. Came packaged well, no scratches, dings etc. Was not difficult to put together (even with my 16 month old stealing parts). I've slept in it with her as I'm trying to transition her and it's supports my 129# and her 24# without a problem. Its beautiful, would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed for my baby/toddler
customer_reviews.text: Based on a a few reviews I was hesitant to purchase this toddler daybed but I gave it a try and it was worth it. My bed did not come with lots of scratches or dents like others. There was one minor crack but it could have very well happened when I was pulling everything out the box due to my children playing with the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible condition
customer_reviews.text: Honestly was very disappointed, the wood was scratched up everywhere and had chunks missing. It was missing screws to assemble and the bottom of the drawer so we had to go buy and cut it to fit. If i wasn’t in need of the bed i would have returned it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Renee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed! It's just a pain assembling the bed and the drawer is a wee crooked. But, other than that happy to have purchased this product. Edit: I bought this bed 8 months ago and assembled it a few weeks after. So about 7 ish months of use. Today my toddler woke up from a nap and I noticed pieces were "breaking off". Along with the wood planks beneath the mattress. (But that was the pain over all). I'm sure wood glue will fix the issue. But, in my opinion when spending this amount of money on the bed I shouldn't have to. Off to looking for a better bed.
customer_reviews.author: Merissa

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Sturdy wood. Fits a baby/toddler mattress. Has a bottom drawer. That was a little difficult to get on right and to pull out. To pull out, you have to lift up and then pull out. Still a great bed for your toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Forester

customer_reviews.title: Love it but the handling could be better..
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this bed. And so do I. Despite reviews stating the drawer doesn’t work or gets stuck I went with it anyways and I have no issues with it. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because like other reviewers complained the bed had bangs and dents on it. Nothing detrimental but noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is very sturdy and it wasn’t hard to assemble. If I had a do over, I would get the version without the drawers. The additional cost for the drawers isn’t worth it, as they are basically super thin plywood/cardboard material for the bottoms. The bed itself is sturdy, just not the drawers. Our toddler is enjoying her new big girl bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ruff Lyfe

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I put it together with the tool in the package and a butter knife! That's how easy it was to put together lol. I bought black because red was out of stock, but it fits a 2 year old perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Wicked Shann

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. My granddaughter does. Still haven’t put the draw together but this is a very sturdy well built bed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McFarland

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even know where to start... after assembling it the bottom part started breaking my daughter who is 22 months old got a splinter from touching the bottom edge !!! I do not recommend this toddler bed
customer_reviews.author: Ocean HAWAII

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed
customer_reviews.text: My bed arrived with no packaging issues. It's a sturdy, real wood bed. The drawer glides smoothly and there is a little space between the floor and the drawer so you don't stub your toes. I assembled it by myself and the instructions were clear and simple.
customer_reviews.author: audiebear

customer_reviews.title: Dream On Me Toddler Daybed
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product.I'm a 66 year old women and put the daybed together myself. the slats were a little tricky but I figured out how to put them in .Some slats had to go in first ,some were for the middle and some last to put in . its a process of elimination.But it took me about 2 hours to put together. Make sure you get the right mattress to go into the daybed.I got the American Baby Company waterproof fitted mattress. It fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Tri

customer_reviews.title: We were pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice piece of furniture. The neutral color is good for many different bedding options or color schemes in the room. The drawer is really shallow, however, holds extra bedding (sheets, pillowcases, etc.). It is a sturdy construction, and suits our needs well, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis McManus

customer_reviews.title: Storage Drawer!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was great and the bed was a perfect size. However, I was disappointed with the storage drawer and the main reason why I bought it. Needless to say, the storage drawer had to be thrown away. The bottom pieces did not fit together and were cut way to big to even slide Into the drawer. Even tried cutting them to the right size and the boards still did not line up. Overall, I love the bed but the storage was a fail.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: We love this bed. It is a perfect size even for my well above average height 3 year old. We added the removable vinyl stickers to the frame ourselves to go with his room. Fit our crib mattress perfectly. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope nothing goes wrong...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with broken pieces. Had to assemble and use the bed anyway, because the kid needed somewhere to sleep. When I tried to get replacement parts through Dream on Me, they said they were out of stock, tough luck. It's a way better product than anything Ikea offers, in terms of assembly and build quality, but if something goes wrong, don't expect the company to help you out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Lettieri

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this company has a quality control staff but dang near every corner piece of wood was damaged out of the box in one way or another. See pics. It was easy to put together. Feels Relatively sturdy. Not happy about the dings though.
customer_reviews.author: The4thClifford

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a white color but however i got expresso for some odd reason I rechecked my amazon order and notice it was changed. I was upset due to it not matching my daughter room but however it was easy to assemble and directions was pretty easy
customer_reviews.author: Jamarr Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: So I Was exited to buy my daughter a big girl bed for her 3rd birthday I was looking at this bed for a while I had 2minds about it since the reviews are not that great nevertheless I love this bed I Order it and it came perfectly fine I put it together myself only took me 1hr my daughter also loves it she sleeps perfectly fine these beds are great for toddler
customer_reviews.author: Muslimah Azad

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler transition
customer_reviews.text: Zero complaints with this product. It assembled very well and our little one loves it! The drawer was a little tricky to put together (took two of us) and isn’t extensively manufactured but again, for the price, nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: KateMonster

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so perfect. My 15 month old daughter absolutely loves it. She's a very independent girl and loves to get on and off the bed herself. Despite other negative reviews, my package came neatly packaged with all pieces except one major thing... THE INSTRUCTIONS!! Regardles, I am a resourceful single mom and did a Google search for the pdf file of the instructions on how to put the bed together. Worked just great and got it together buy myself within an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged, luckily it was a piece that cannot be seen when assembled. We ordered white, but the entire drawer came in purple pieces. Again, not pieces that can be seen once assembled. The directions are not very clear and the pieces are not marked in any way to assist with assembly. This is the first night, my daughter hasn’t slept in it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beautiful and perfect, but it can be a bear to out together. I recommend having an extra helping hand for this one.
customer_reviews.author: ambigates96

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but beware of poor wood quality
customer_reviews.text: The drawer came cracked really badly, but other than that it's a nice bed for my toddler. The drawer isn't a high priority anyways and my husband was able to fix it with super glue.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great bed but needed spacers for drawer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality bed, would have been 5 stars but I had to add spacers to the drawer tracks to get it to fit properly. Easy fix but it should have fit without having to alter it. Drawers are definitely shallow but they are perfect for extra sheets and pillow cases.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I received 2 different colors with scratches. Item was damaged upon arrival. Amazon adjusted the price but the representative was very disrespectful. We couldn’t use the bottom drawer because all of the pieces were not there.
customer_reviews.author: Theprettyartist

customer_reviews.title: Damaged. Now have to return.
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to receive this bed and get our toddler moved into it however while unboxing this package there were several damaged pieces including a large crack through piece H which is the front of the drawer. We are returning it and will hopefully receive a replacement that is not damaged all over.
customer_reviews.author: jaxs

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, sturdy, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. It is SO cute! It is not too bulky so It fits perfect in my kids’ room without it feeling crowded. The drawer is not very deep but it is wide enough so a good amount of things fit in it. It was very easy to assemble and feels very sturdy. I’m very happy with this toddler’s bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jasiel

customer_reviews.title: Good bed but....
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new bed it was easy to put together. I wanted to rate it with 5 stars but the reason i gave it four is because of the many scratches i found on the bed and they are easy and fast to notice that is very sad .. Other than that it is a beautiful and cute bed with fine details. My son did fall out of the bed a few times but because it is a low bed he didnt get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Nounou

customer_reviews.title: a good bed for children
customer_reviews.text: The sides are high and protect against falling out. Even with a high mattress there is still enough protection. I like the natural wooden material and the design. I can recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Borgwardt

customer_reviews.title: Cute, and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is very cute, and certainly gets the job done. For the price paid, I think it’s a great deal. The bottom drawer is very small, and doesn’t feel the most sturdiest, but it’s better than no storage at all. My daughter loves it, and overall I’m very satisfied considering I paid $134 for it.
customer_reviews.author: KASEY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bed and the quality is very good. I was skeptical given other reviews, but it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ODAM

customer_reviews.title: I like that is pretty close to the ground
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this bed for our 20 months old son. It is his first transfer from the crib to a toddler bed. I like that is pretty close to the ground. But it came damage with scratches and the drawers made cheap. Bottom is falling through. But it works for yet
customer_reviews.author: kaefer82

customer_reviews.title: Lots of assembly, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so cute. It was exactly what I wanted. It was relatively cheap so I guess I should have expected to find some knicks and dings on it. Nothing too bad. Totally unnoticeable after I put it together. Its sturdy and I found it easy to put together although it took a couple hours. The drawer required some finesse to get it lined up just right. But overall I love it and I can't wait to show my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: 5 star!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice durable bed, my son loves it! It had a big scuff mark on the wood right on the top of the bed very noticeable when it arrived in the box. Not sure if it was from shipping but i did notice other reviews with the same issues but that doesn’t mean it’s not a good bed! I don’t mind the scuff mark so it was 100% worth it for us. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!! Absolutely worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received item fast! Nothing was wrong no scratches or dents ! The cutest little bed! My daughter loves the bed which is a extra bonus. I assembled the bed myself while my husband was at work so fast and easy took me about 25 mins tops including dressing the bed with sheets 🤙🏼👍🏻 Great item !
customer_reviews.author: Jcgiga973

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: One of the drawer bottom pieces arrived with the corner broken off. However I just used some wood glue and repaired it. It is hardly visible once I assembled the drawer. I think this was a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jill simino

customer_reviews.title: the crazy thing was is that the box it was packed in was great but the bed was damaged inside
customer_reviews.text: product was damaged wood chipping. the crazy thing was is that the box it was packed in was great but the bed was damaged inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelsd

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy this bed is, and although it was tricky to put together, the directions were very clear and detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Sagendorf

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I built it. Wasn’t to difficult. There was one piece that was cracked when we got it but it was only for the drawer so we weren’t worried about it, and it screwed in just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Classic look.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and easily assembled. The drawer under the bed is definitely not intended to hold much as it is not very sturdy. It is made of thin particle board. Otherwise the bed is as expected and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his new bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for my 1 year old. He absolutely loves it. It's very cute and very reasonably priced. Came with all the parts. Didnt take too long to put together. We were very pleased with how it looks. It's very easy for my son to get in and out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric hurley

customer_reviews.title: Purchases this bed for your little one!!!😀
customer_reviews.text: The bed is perfect for my 1-year-old. We wanted to purchase a bed that was low to the floor, with storage space, and safe. Awesome I would recommend this bed. The price was just right. My husband had no problem putting it together. It took him less than a hour to put this adorable bed together for our baby girl...
customer_reviews.author: La'kisa Parker

customer_reviews.title: well...
customer_reviews.text: I love that all pieces are in the box. But in all honesty, it looked like I received someones go back product. The packaging has to be better, all wooden pieces were damaged with tons of scratches. It took about 2 hours to put it together. Build the drawer before the bed, you'll realize that its better that way. Its my toddlers first bed, lets hope it lasts!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick to put together. No damages
customer_reviews.text: This bed was so easy to put together! I did it myself (while 4 months pregnant) in a little over one hour. I was a little hesitant to get this bed because of some reviews but I had no dings or damages at all. The only down side is that the rail only goes on one side, it is not interchangeable. This made me have to switch my toddlers side of the room from what I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: megan singer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought like new condition said o ly issue was box damaged took out of box had a big scratch on wood if I'd know that I wouldn't of bought it. Description said bed has no defects only box
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. That's all that mattered..
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems with bed frame. My son absolutely loved his new bed. We as adults may get upset about damage to the frame but the kids reaction is what matters most. At least to me. The only problem with assembly is my husband put the front bar on the opposite way so had to disassemble to put the side rail on lol.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Casarez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I do not use the toddler rail so I wish there was a way to plug the hole where the bolt goes but, be that as it may I love this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i wanted for my daughter's room. Only disadvantage is that some of the pieces look purple so i had to get a can of white spray paint for those few pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Cookee

customer_reviews.title: nothing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little granddaughter. She is really enjoying it. She is 14 months old now.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Krieg

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly and good
customer_reviews.text: I like that its low enough that the baby can fall out and not get hurt. I wish the storage drawer was deeper and the baby would sleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: Moya with dirtbike

customer_reviews.title: It serves it's purpose for my two year old and I like that it came with storage underneath
customer_reviews.text: The first one came damaged and had to be returned and re ordered. The second order came when expected and had a few chips and scratches in the wood but I expected as much for the price. It serves it's purpose for my two year old and I like that it came with storage underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Rolen

customer_reviews.title: Look for dents
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed but it came with a dent. We were already almost done building it so we weren’t going to disassemble the bed when it wasn’t that easy to assemble. So we are keeping it with the dent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Hard
customer_reviews.text: It took forever to figure out the instructions on how to put it together and then the drawer that goes below the bed was broken. I have requested that a new one be shipped so we will see how they comply. I'm holding off on my opinion on value for money until I see their their response.
customer_reviews.author: Edie

customer_reviews.title: Drawer falls off easily
customer_reviews.text: The bed is fine, but the drawer continues to fall off making it not function properly. It is extremely frustrating and completely defeats the purpose of having the storage underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I do not regref buying this we love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: There was a few extra pieces. The back and sides of the drawers were a light purple but you really don't even notice it once it's set up. Was a few little dents, but overall, I love it, my son loves it, it was what I expected. I do not regret this purchase one bit. It's adorable and perfect size. Will update in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Morley

customer_reviews.title: Best Toddler Bed
customer_reviews.text: Great to have as a transitional bed for your toddler. She loved it from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Carleigh

customer_reviews.title: Our Daughter Loves Her Bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect toddler bed that is safe at night yet offers easy entry and egress for a toddler. Easy to assemble. No damaged parts as other purchasers reported. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard W. Carper, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect transition from crib
customer_reviews.text: Never write reviews. I purchased this for our 2 year old who was climbing out of the crib. I was just looking for a quick and easy solution. I am so surprised by the quality of this bed. The drawer underneath is great for storage of sheets and stuff. Love how low it is to the floor in case he does fall out. It’s a perfect toddler bed. It’s actuslly really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bed was easy to put together and my 3 yr old loves it! Very sturdy and well made and the black finish goes perfect with the other furniture in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased
customer_reviews.text: The bed was pretty easy to put together however it is a 2 person job... my bed came scuffed on the footboard from delivery and when placing the wood slats one of mine came cut to long and did fit however I dnt really seem to see where it’s effecting the support of the bed thus far overall I’m satisfied with it and will be buying another to add to our daughters room
customer_reviews.author: Treasure

customer_reviews.title: Big hit for the big boy!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and durable! Easy to put together! Storage drawer is very convenient- just don’t let kiddos use it as a step. Our son has loved growing into this bed!
customer_reviews.author: EmCA

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent bed. It did show up poorly packaged and damaged with some knix on the wood. The drawer was thr hardest part to put together. I would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Seth Freeman

customer_reviews.title: He loved it and still does
customer_reviews.text: We got this when our son was 18 months. He loved it and still does! The drawer underneath is perfect for clothes or extra blankets. It does seem to have a slight odor for awhile,but then is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fitst time sleeping alone type of bed. Small and close to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Suany M.

customer_reviews.title: Good price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: If you have a big infant like I do, they will outgrow this quick. I have a 40 pound 2 year old boy and I can tell he will be too big for this in 8 months
customer_reviews.author: J. Steven

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: If assembled correctly it is as good as it gets for the valve.
customer_reviews.author: Renato Perez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: There were a few dings and scratches but its so beautiful and study. I love it and my baby girl loves it so much. This was definitely a great choice. It took me about 2 hours to put together but that's I had one board upside down and had to redo it.
customer_reviews.author: Shanique Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Cute toddler day bed
customer_reviews.text: Adorable toddler day bed. Low to the ground, partial railing and small storage drawer underneath. Not too difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: mmancc11399

customer_reviews.title: Great solid crib couldnt ask for more
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitent to buy this crib due to all the negative reviews it got, but i decided to buy it anyway bc of the price. When it was all said and done and put together, I was quite impressed!! The crib was built strong and solid. The draws were working sufficently no issues except rather small, but wasnt a major issue for $130. only issue i had was the color. it came in a light brownish color not dark. overall this product is great and for the money i could not have asked for a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great bed for our son
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great bed for our son. It is sturdy and easy to put together. I know there are reviews complaining about the drawer below but it fits sheets and blankets. I also like the fact that it doesn't look like a drawer. He has no idea it is there and so far has not pulled anything out.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality and ease of putting the bed together. The drawer we did not put together, it was the most complicated part of the bed and it looked like it could hold some light things but ultimately not worth it for us.
customer_reviews.author: Momma E

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for what you get
customer_reviews.text: This toddler bed is okay enough but it came with so much cosmetic damage all over the place. It is cheap quality and I expected a little better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great bed and great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed and so does my granddaughter! It’s her first big girl bed!! Grandpa put it together pretty quick!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Linnell

customer_reviews.title: Monkey business
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. My daughter likes to climb all over things and this holds up to her monkey business.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Got this bed for my 2yr old. So far it's done well. When it arrived it did have a few Knicks on it. But my toddler ended up banging his toys against the bed which created even more Knicks on it. The instructions of some pieces we're confusing but we finished it within an hour I believe. It's not squeaky, my son hasn't fallen out, and we'll be buying another one for my daughter since we're expecting baby #3 this year.
customer_reviews.author: Ms V

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and super sturdy! I lay in this bed with my toddler all the time and it hasnt collapsed yet!
customer_reviews.author: MichelleR

customer_reviews.title: missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: it arrived with so many missing bolts and screws and it was so scratched I am so disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Messaged seller bc several pieces were dented, dinged, cracked, never heard back. Box had huge hole in it when it arrived. The bed is cute and it looks nice bc ive painted and hidden all the junky looking pieces. I should get at least a partial refund but I probably won't.
customer_reviews.author: R&R

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a great toddler bed. My daughter loves it. Was easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I also love the storage underneath which was a selling point for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roddy L. Tomberlin

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could return
customer_reviews.text: It is not ideal for an average sized toddler. The drawer is pointless and it is not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: pharmamama

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: We really like this bed so far! Exactly what I wanted for my 2 year old. I love the storage underneath! I am storing his shoes in it. Is very sturdy, my husband sat on it with my son, so collectively ~200 pounds and it didn’t even make a noise. Ours was not damaged and was very well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this bed to arrive but was instantly disappointed when I went to assemble it and there were chunks of wood missing and paint scratched off. I wouldn't mind if I had bought the bed used from a garage sale but it was supposed to be brand new. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Debi V.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely priced
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought for my grandson. It wasn’t hard to put up. However, we did notice some scratches on certain parts of the bed. Nevertheless, it’s a good fit and sits in his room perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice daughter loves her big girl bed. The storage is a plus for extra blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Lucrecia

product_meta.title: Dream On Me, Toddler Day Bed with Storage Drawer, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteThe Dream On Me Toddler Day Bed is the ideal transition bed for when your child is too big for a crib but too small for a full-size bed. It features a convenient low-to-floor design, making it easy for your child to get in and out of bed. A removable side safety guard rail prevents any accidental falls for the restless sleeper!The Day Bed’s design is stylish and functional. A mix of curved and straight lines makes it perfect to blend in with a variety of room decors. Let your child pick from five stylish non-toxic finishes!Keep bed linen and your child’s essentials handy in the roomy storage drawer below the bed. Two compartments allow you to keep everything neatly organized! The Toddler Day Bed comes with a wooden mattress support so there is no need for a box spring. Choose any Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard certified standard crib mattress for a perfect fit. The Toddler Day Bed is JPMA certified and meets/exceeds all applicable ASTM and CPSC standards. All tools needed for assembly are included. Recommended for children 18 months to 5 years old or up to 50 lbs. Product specs are: 54.5Lx29Wx28

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This handsomely designed, durable, solid wood toddler bed, looks like a day bed but is low to the floor for your toddlers convenience plus has the security of a safety rail to prevent accidental falls while sleeping. It features a roomy storage drawer underneath the bed, wooden mattress support so there is no need for a box spring and an appealing non toxic finish. This attractive day bed accommodates a Dream On Me crib mattress, sold separately. Recommended for children 18 months to 5 years old up to 50 pounds. All tools needed for easy assembly are included.
feature_bullets: Solid wood toddler bed, low to the floor
Safety rail and roomy storage drawer
Dream On Me standard mattress, sold separately
All tools for easy assembly included
product weight 39.5. Recommended for children 18 months to 5 years old or up to 50 lbs.
